column4: and i can't even run synaptic to find the entire nvidia package simply because I can't open any programs.
because i don't have a window manager that will run, because beryl crapped out.
dual 7300gts working fine in the -386 kernel
dude, i had dual screens running working fine on -386 kernel
all i did was go to -generic kernel on grub menu.
if your driver changed, you can need to alter xorg.conf sometimes
how did my driver change?
my net isn't slow
wireshark
wireshark installed
yep
i get some wierd things
but ftp etc are full speed?
incorrect checksums are usually because you have got your ethernet duplex setting wrong

today i was getting max speed off torrents, browsing the net fine
install net-tools & use mii-tool to force 100baseTx-FD, reset the modem & see how you go
on desktop, no - for servers, sure
